parameters.packs: Logarithm of cigarette consumption (in packs) per person of smoking age (> 16 years).
parameters.income: Logarithm of real disposable income (per capita) in each state.
parameters.price: Logarithm of real price of cigarette in each state.

title: Cigarette Consumption Data
description:
Description
Cross-section data on cigarette consumption for 46 US States, for the year 1992.
format: A data frame containing 46 observations on 3 variables.
